Author: Gangreless
Text: Check out /r/fasting for some more in depth stuff. You can also search for "snake juice" and use that but with a lot more water than it has. The ratios for magnesium (Epsom salt), sodium, and potassium are good, tough. It should taste just a little bit salty and you can just keep a bottle in the fridge and sip on it during the day, you don't need a whole lot but if you're feeling like crap you probably need more. I'll see if I can find it.
